A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was entertaining\, but the moment you sit back and think\, you realize\, the majority of the story takes place over s very short period of time. in fact many crucial plots take place as the rebels are \"cruising away ever so slightly faster than their pursuers\". That fact in itself\, the main plot and chase were so foolish. I mean it is like they wrote themselves into a corner. It was literally the dumbest plot point ever.
